Mendokusai

Tartarus

Commit Yourself Completely

13 Jun 2019

In exciting news, Car Seat Headrest announced a new live album is coming on Monday. In even more exciting news, two of the songs were recorded at their show in London that I was at, so you will be able to hear me singing along somewhere amongst the din.

While I wish CSH would hurry up and make another studio album, being able to tap into the feeling I had watching them play Beach Life-in-Death live on a streaming service is going to make me happy for weeks to come.
